column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Since the foie gras and beef tongues were so heavy
column2: I got something "lighter". I almost never get salads
column3: but I got the Crab Stuffed Avocado. This was my first time having bibb lettuce and the sherry-dijon vinegrette was delicious! Didn't take a picture of his dish
column4: but it was short rib stroganoff.
